DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study factors (drugs, serum concentration of drugs, nutrition, physical activity, demographics, diseases etc.) related to constipation and diarrhea in nursing homes, and the effect of different laxative regimens.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Drugs and Constipation in Nursing Homes
DOC.criteria: Above 60 years old Stayed in nursing homes for more than 8 weeks Informed consent Expected discharge within 2 weeks Organic disorders causing constipation and diarrhea
